testimonials.description: Trends in Web Development has been an incredibly valuable course, equipping me with practical skills and knowledge that will greatly benefit my future career. The final project was a rewarding experience, allowing me to put my new skills into practice and create a project I'm proud of!
testimonials.name: Juju Crane

testimonials.description: Trends was a great class because of the hands-on webdev practice you get. It helped me see web development as a whole, and also gave me a project that I could use in my portfolio!
testimonials.name: Ryan Qiu

testimonials.description: I took Trends my freshman fall and it has been one of my favorite experiences at Cornell. I didn't really know anything about web development before taking the class, but the class gave me so much practical knowledge. As a senior, I still utilize the skills I learned in Trends across my current projects and a past internship!
testimonials.name: Reid Fleishman
